title: List of science fiction films of the 2020s
html:
List of science fiction films of the 2020s

From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
Jump to navigation Jump to search

This film-related list is incomplete; you can help by adding missing items. (October 2021)

This is a list of science fiction films released in the 2020s. These films include core elements of science fiction, but can cross into other genres. They have been released to a cinema audience by the commercial film industry and are widely distributed with reviews by reputable critics.

Contents

  • 1 Listing
  • 2 Forthcoming
  • 3 See also
  • 4 Notes
  • 5 References

paragraphs.text: This is a list of science fiction films released in the 2020s. These films include core elements of science fiction, but can cross into other genres. They have been released to a cinema audience by the commercial film industry and are widely distributed with reviews by reputable critics.
